name: Solar Crew
description:
A crew of planets (and The Star of course) embark on a trip to gather some tasty comets, but it's not going to be as easy as it seemed.

Solar Crew is an arcade game made in a week by Denis Kotenko (sound), Regina Kuznetsova (art), Elizaveta Khvorova (art) and Pavel Sergaziev (everything else) for the BlackThornProd GameJam 2.

To catch or avoid objects flying in space, press up/down to switch between planets and hold left/right to rotate them. Skip dialogue by pressing left mouse button, enter or spacebar.

For more info check 'How to Play' and 'Credits' sections in the game menu.

WARNING! There's no NSFW content in the game, but still some people may find some of the images disturbing.

P.S. If you want to listen to the soundtrack, you can find it on the SoundCloud - https://soundcloud.com/pavel-sergaziev/sets/solar-crew-soundtrack

Ver1.01 - Intro/intermission ambient sound added.
